<<<api>>>: List.get
<<<code>>>: new AlertDialog.Builder(view.getContext())
            .setIcon(obj_ItemDetail.getImageNumber())
            .setMessage(obj_ItemDetail.getItemDescription())
            .setNegativeButton("Close", null).show();
<<<explanation>>>: To show the array item_detail in an AlertDialog, you can use the AlertDialog.Builder class to create a dialog with the desired properties. In this case, we set the icon to the image number of the item_detail, the message to the item description, and add a negative button with the text "Close". Finally, we call the show() method to display the dialog.

Question: How to get the last value of an ArrayList: How to get the last value of an ArrayList?
Please using this api: List.get.
Answer:<<<api>>>: List.get
<<<code>>>: E e = list.get(list.size() - 1);
<<<explanation>>>: First get the size of the list, then the last element is at index size - 1.

   item_detail.setName("Cake");    item_detail.setItemDescription("");    item_detail.setPrice("5.000");    item_detail.setImageNumber(1);    result.add(item_detail);    item_detail = new ItemDetail();    item_detail.setName("Coklat");    item_detail.setItemDescription("Bulat");    item_detail.setPrice("5.500");    item_detail.setImageNumber(2);    result.add(item_detail);    item_detail = new ItemDetail();    item_detail.setName("Purple");    item_detail.setItemDescription("Cupcake");    item_detail.setPrice("6.000");    item_detail.setImageNumber(3);    result.add(item_detail);    return result;}}this is my code :public void onCreate(Bundle savedInstanceState) {    super.onCreate(savedInstanceState);    setContentView(R.layout.activity_list_view_image);    ArrayList<ItemDetail> image_detail = GetSearchResult();    final ListView lv1 = (ListView) findViewById(R.id.listV_main);    lv1.setAdapter(new ItemListBaseAdapter(this, image_detail));    lv1.setOnItemClickListener(new OnItemClickListener() {        @Override        public void onItemClick(AdapterView<?> a, View view, int position, long id){            Object o = lv1.getItemAtPosition(position);            ItemDetail obj_ItemDetail = (ItemDetail)o;            new AlertDialog.Builder(view.getContext())            .setIcon(obj_ItemDetail.getImageNumber())            .setMessage(obj_ItemDetail.getItemDescription())            .setNegativeButton("Close", null).show();            Toast.makeText(ListViewImageActivity.this, "Anda Memilih : " + " " + obj_ItemDetail.getName(), Toast.LENGTH_SHORT).show();        }        });    }private ArrayList<ItemDetail> GetSearchResult() {    // TODO Auto-generated method stub    ArrayList<ItemDetail> result = new ArrayList<ItemDetail>();    //Beri keterangan untuk arrayitem detail    ItemDetail item_detail = new ItemDetail();    item_detail.setName("Cake");    item_detail.setItemDescription("");    item_detail.setPrice("5.000");    item_detail.setImageNumber(1);    result.add(item_detail);    item_detail = new ItemDetail();    item_detail.setName("Coklat");    item_detail.setItemDescription("Bulat");    item_detail.setPrice("5.500");    item_detail.setImageNumber(2);    result.add(item_detail);    item_detail = new ItemDetail();    item_detail.setName("Purple");    item_detail.setItemDescription("Cupcake");    item_detail.setPrice("6.000");    item_detail.setImageNumber(3);    result.add(item_detail);    return result;}}
